step_1: Draw a line using a ruler and label it PQ
step_2: Set the compass width to more than half of PQ from one of the vertices P.
step_3: Draw an arc from P intersecting PQ at point A.
step_4: Draw an arc from A intersecting the previous arc at a point.
step_5: Label the intersection of arcs as point O.
step_6: Draw a line from P through O to form the angle.
